sources.snippet_or_excerpt: A year-end options expiry for bitcoin is suppressing volatility just as macro and risk-asset positioning turns supportive for a higher...

hypothesis_content.title: Multi-Timeframe Confluence Breakout Momentum
hypothesis_content.statement: A simultaneous breakout above a key weekly resistance level and a 20-day high, confirmed by a surge in spot volume (>150% of 20-day average), will lead to a sustained 5-7 day momentum move in the BULL or NEUTRAL regime.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Breakouts that align across multiple timeframes (weekly structure and daily momentum) and are fueled by high spot volume indicate strong, consensus-driven buying. This combination is less likely to be a false signal and more likely to attract trend-following capital.
entry_conditions: Price closes above a defined weekly resistance level (e.g., prior weekly high)
On the same day, price closes above its 20-day high
Spot volume for the breakout day is >150% of the 20-day average volume

exit_conditions.take_profit: 7 days after entry, OR when the 5-day RSI crosses below 70 from overbought
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price closes back below the weekly resistance level

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If less than 60% of such high-volume, multi-timeframe breakouts result in a higher close 7 days later, the hypothesis is falsified.
